tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Laparoscopic Surgery (Obs & Gyn),Pregnancy Check Up,Fertility Treatment,In-Vitro Fertilization (IVF),
review:
I had my IVF with Doctor Sachin and I am continuing my pregnancy checkups with him and Dr. Nisha.
I wasn't able to conceive due fertility issues for which I had been to multiple doctors. 
A very renowned doctor clearly told me that its not possible for me to have a child even by IVF if I use my own eggs and have to go via the donor route.
I was shaken by that as my age was just 27 and was married for one year and wanted to have my own biological child.
Then I met one more doctor who was very sweet to me and gave me 80% guarantee for IVF with my own eggs. 
I had an IVF round with her in Dec 2017 which was not successful and suddenly her behavior changed completely.
Finally I went to Dr. Sachin and he was very transparent about my success rates for IVF with own and donor eggs and gave me the choice to decide the route.
I was very adamant that I want try with my own eggs and Dr. Sachin put up a plan for me accordingly.
There are very few doctors who will give you that opportunity and put in their efforts when theoretically most of the factors are against you.
He was very supportive and tried multiple IVF protocols for me and finally I got pregnant on my first transfer with him.
I am very fortunate to have found a doctor who is straightforward, respects your decisions and is not behind money.
He is also very polite and patiently responds to all your queries.
I will always be grateful to him for this wonderful gift and am I am continuing my pregnancy journey with him and Dr. Nisha.
If anyone else has fertility issues and not able to overcome it then I would urge that you should approach him at-least once.
Dr. Sachin, Dr. Nisha and the entire hospital staff is very co-operative and helpful.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was a wonderful experience with Mr. Sachin . My Laparoscopy was done by him and he did it in the most smooth way. Prior to that, I had my HSG test done twice by Dr. Shreya. HSG, as people say is a very painful process, but my HSG was done in a very painless way. That is the reason may be, I could survive two HSG. On the operation day I was very very scared as it was my first operation ever. I was a troublemaker in the hospital. but Dr. Sneha and Anesthetist Dr. Shetty handled me in a very easy and smooth way. Other staff and nurses are also very supportive. Finally coming to Dr. Sachin, besides being a good doctor and an expert in his field, he is an amazing person. He is so sure of his job and has such clarity of what he is doing , that you become confident to do things. The way he gives you hope and emotional support by cheering you in a very positive way and that's what matters for a struggling couple who goes through that emotional turmoil of conceiving. I think he is a amazing doctor and an amazing person and that makes him so successful. 5 Ratings by me for Dr. Sachin and Madhu Clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dear Doctor (SACHIN DALAAL),
With all RESPECT & LOVE FROM BOTTOM OF MY HEART -

I and my father (ANIL GHAG)  would like to express my deepest gratitude for everything that you have done for my MOTHER during her CRITICAL HEALTH SITUATION treatment I never thought that I would see her smiling again after she faced critical pain and bleeding problem in past week . You gave me a glimpse of hope when you explained about the procedure and the post operation therapy to be conducted for her instead of her hemoglobin at 7Gm as it was very risky operation which you did with Nisha Krishnan  and your team in theatre. I thank you all humbly from bottom of my heart and wish you can put smile across infinite faces who come to you as a hope to get their loved ones recovered and healthy again after you treat the patient with all your love and care with your staff member help too of MADHU (BHANDUP WEST)hospital.

On behalf of our family, I wish to thank you for your expert care and professional wisdom during my mother's battle with the BLADDER INFECTION IN UTERUS SINCE 3 MOTHS.

Thank you for being patient with me, DAY after DAY DURING WHOLE WEEK during my MOTHER treatment towards fast recovery. On each and every trip to your clinic, I see the future getting  brighter ahead with all your love and support of care. (My mother (Neelam Ghag) got ADMITTED on 23rd July 2019 Tue- OPERATED ON 26th Fri - and discharged on 29th July ) My mother always say me the operation was done by god in the Operation theatre and she really mean that words you cured her out of the critical pain.

 

Thank you very much for the phenomenal job SACHINJI!! Now, that I can move again, I'm speechless to express how thankful I am to you for gifting my MOTHER LIFE again to make me smile and my Father too. You are a blessing to our lives as well as to other patients who have suffered similar conditions as my mother.  This greeting is for YOU SACHIN DALAAL & NISHA K and TEAM with your staff of hospitals on behalf of my MOTHER, FATHER AND MEE (Sangeeta Anil Ghag - Daughter of Neelam G).

Dear doctor, thanks for teaching me the difference between Fact and Faith: Fact is when any ordinary doctor diagnoses illness in a report. Faith is when good doctors like you give their patients the strength to recover.

 

It was a blessing knowing you. Thank God and you for everything you did to give your BEST.

Love you all SURGEONS!!!

Respectfully,

Dr. Sachin Dalaal!!! :)
reply_text:
Dear Sangeeta,

Thanks for the kind feedback.

It was a pleasure treating your mother.

Dr Sachin Dalal

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He is an incredible gynecologist throughout my pregnancy journey. Their expertise, compassion, and attention to detail made me feel confident and cared for. From prenatal check-ups to labor and delivery, even with huge to a silliest  doubts, he provided  a steady support. Thanks to his guidance, I had a safe and healthy pregnancy  .  I had a truly positive experience with my  caesarean delivery, despite hearing many negative reviews and concerns about potential complications of caesarean type of delivery. Thanks to the expertise of the team, led by him the entire process was smooth and complication-free busting myths of caesarean. They ensured I was well-informed and comfortable throughout. I'm grateful for their skill and care, which made my caesarean delivery a safe and positive experience, dispelling any doubts or fears I had. I highly recommend him to any expectant mother. Thanks to their skillful guidance, I had a smooth  childbirth.

I hd my hystereoscopic metroplasty n laproscopy on 26th sept after that my doc suggested me take bed rest n come for the check up on 3rd Oct. I took an appointment n visited doc. He was happy with my recovery of wound on my abdomen after lap. He also added that I can join my ruotine work. Prescribed me with appropriate medicines. 
Thanku
Happy to share.
